name: Stellar Leap
description:
Stellar Leap is a 3D platformer developed by Team MYB.

In Stellar Leap, your survival is dependent on how you wield your trusty grappling hook. Stick the beam on walls, and swing your way through an enigmatic space facility filled with dangerous pitfalls. When you've grown accustomed to the physics, you can even go for a speedrun attempt and see how much momentum you can build up!

Our team also participated in the Assembly 2019 game dev competition with this game.

Team MYB:

Jari Rönkä (Programming)

Vili Tuppurainen (Programming)

Janne Viinikanoja (Programming, Music, SFX)

Veeti Hietala (3D Art)

Jaakko Ylimäki (2D Art, Music, SFX, Trailer)
